ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Influence_Payout_Model__c, "Percentage"), OR( Influence_Payout_Percentage__c < 0, Influence_Payout_Percentage__c > 1, ISNULL(Influence_Payout_Percentage__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Your new program needs review! You’ve selected ‘Percentage’ for the Influenced Payout Model, but have not included the desired percentage amount. Please update the 'Influence Payout % Amount” to a number greater than 0 and lower than 100.
